alert.note: Alert for Franklin (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 11 at 11:13PM CDT until August 12 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Franklin County in west central Arkansas... * Until midnight CDT. * At 1112 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles south of Cass to 2 miles east of Altus to 4 miles southeast of Ratcliff, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 to 70 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations in or near the path include... Ozark... Altus... Denning... Wiederkehr Village... Jethro... Etna... Alix... Barnes... Watalula... Meg... Toney... Peter Pender... Turners Bend... Cecil... Lonelm... Cravens... Paradise... This includes Interstate 40 in Arkansas between mile markers 26 and 42. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
